title: GIVEN a user is on the Player and Team Management Page and does not have a followed team set
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Player and Team Management Page
AND the user does not have a followed a team
custom_steps: WHEN they tap  ‘Add Players’ or ‘Add Teams’
custom_expected: THEN the Team and Roster module will launch

title: User Can Toggle Between Players & Teams tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Team and Roster module
custom_steps: When the user taps on Teams tab
custom_expected: THEN they can toggle between the Players and Teams

title: Follow & Unfollow players from Teams tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Team and Roster module
custom_steps: WHEN they are on the Team tab
custom_expected:
THEN they will be able to select a team to follow and unfollow from there by tapping the follow/unfollow pill 
And the proper changes should reflect on the user account via Profile services

title: Tapping "DONE" will take the user back to Manage Teams and Players screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Team and Roster module
custom_steps:
WHEN they are finished selecting their follows

AND the user taps DONE
custom_expected: THEN they will be taken back to the Manage Teams and Players Screen

title: User selects favorite team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Team and Roster module
And the user's Favorite team is "Chicago White Sox"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on "Follow More Player & Teams" button
And the user taps on the "Teams" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to select a team to follow by tapping the "FOLLOW" pill (button)
BUT the user cannot follow "Chicago White Sox"

title: Tapping on Edit will bring up the delete options on players and teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the favorite and follow management page
And I am following the "White Sox" as my followed team
AND I am following "Mookie Betts" as my followed player
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an `delete` icon to remove "White Sox" team
AND I should see an `delete` icon to remove "Mookie Betts"

title: Tapping on the delete icon will remove a team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the favorite and follow management page
AND I am following the "White Sox" as my followed team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap Edit
AND I tap the delete icon ![](index.php?/attachments/get/13365934)
 on "White Sox" team
AND I tap "Remove"
custom_expected: THEN "White Sox" should be removed from my Followed team list

title: Tapping on the delete icon will remove a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am following the "Aaron Judge" as my followed player
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap edit
AND I tap the delete icon on "Aaron Judge"
AND I tap "Remove"
custom_expected: THEN "Aaron Judge" should be removed from my Followed player list

title: Deleting Followed teams into an Empty State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the favorite and follow management page
AND I am following the "White Sox" as my followed team
AND I am following the "Kansas City Royals" as my followed team
custom_steps:
WHEN I remove the "White Sox" from my followed team
AND I remove the "Kansas City Royals" from my followed team
custom_expected: THEN I should see "Add Teams" link appear

title: Deleting Followed players into an Empty State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the favorite and follow management page
AND I am following "Anthony Rizzo" as my followed player
AND I am following "Mookie Betts" as my followed player
custom_steps:
WHEN I remove "Anthony Rizzo" from my followed players
AND I remove "Mookie Betts" from my followed players
custom_expected:
Then I should see "![](index.php?/attachments/get/13365935)
Add Players" icon/link appear

title: Add Player will bring up the login wall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on My Teams page on the MLB app
AND I am not logged in to the app
AND I am not following any player
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the Login wall
AND I should see an option to login
AND I should see an option to Create an account

title: Attempting to follow a player from the team roster will bring up the login wall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on My Teams page on the MLB app
AND I am not logged in to the app
AND I am not following any player
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Follow More Players & Teams"
AND I select Atlanta Braves
AND I tap on FOLLOW for the first player
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the Login wall
AND I should see an option to login
AND I should see an option to Create an account

title: A user can search for a team
A user can search for a player
Search with no result will show an error screen
A search with . (period) will show no result found screen
A search will begin after a user types in 3 characters into the search box
Upon logging into an MLB account, any local favorite team settings should be written to Profile Service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am not logged into the app
AND I have NY Yankees as my favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN I log into the app
custom_expected:
THEN I should see NY Yankees as my favorite team
AND the favorite team value should be updated to profile services

title: Upon logging into an MLB account, Profile Service data should be pulled in if there is no favorite team selected in the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am a user in the app
AND I am not logged in
BUT I have a NY Mets as my favorite team
custom_steps:
WHEN I log in to the app
AND I view My Teams section of the app from settings
custom_expected: THEN I should see NY Mets as my favorite team

title: Upon logging into an MLB account, any local favorite team settings should be written to Profile Service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the MLB app
AND I am not logged in to the app
AND I am following TB Rays # should be done separately on the web or in iOS app
AND I am following Atlanta Braves
custom_steps:
WHEN I log in to the app
AND I view My Teams section of the app from Settings
custom_expected:
THEN I should see TB Rays in my followed teams section
AND I should see Atlanta Braves in my followed teams section

title: Changing favorite team settings within the app should update both Profile Service and local storage accordingly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the app as faveandfollow@gmail.com, Amlb1271
AND I have Colorado Rockies as my favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN I change my favorite team from Colorado Rockies to Chicago Cubs
custom_expected:
THEN I should see Chicago Cubs as my favorite team
AND the change should be written to Profile Services
AND the change should reflect on my all other devices (iOS and Web)
